A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
For all the true star wars fans\, The last Jedi will be a MAJOR disappointment. What a let down. Sure\, the cinamatics were incredible\, the shots stunning\, and even some farely good acting\, yet this pales in comparison to the story as a whole. This is why it doesn't work having multiple directors for the same trilogy. PJ did it in LOTR\, surely it can be done again.

If you grew up watching the original trilogy\, you will most likely be disgusted at the Disneyfication of this movie. 

As far as I'm concerned\, Star Wars is a 6 movie saga which ended a long time ago in a galaxy far\, far away.
